parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Cracked and Warped Wheels on C7 Corvette
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the wheels can cause tire pressure loss, leading to accidents or loss of control, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: Low tire pressure warning light
slow leak of air
vibration while driving
cracked or warped wheels
loss of air pressure
difficulty controlling the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the power steering system can cause the vehicle to become difficult to steer, increasing the risk of accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering warning light illuminates
the vehicle loses power steering functionality
the steering wheel becomes hard to turn
the vehicle requires extra strength to steer
the power steering assist fails.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unavailable Recall Parts for Power Steering Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of recall parts for the power steering failure can cause the vehicle to remain in an unsafe condition, increasing the risk of accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering warning light illuminates
the vehicle loses power steering functionality
the steering wheel becomes hard to turn
the vehicle requires extra strength to steer
the power steering assist fails.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front Wheel Rubbing and Steering Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The front wheel rubbing and steering issues can cause the vehicle to become difficult to control, increasing the risk of accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The front wheels rub when making sharp turns
the steering wheel becomes hard to turn
the vehicle requires extra strength to steer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the infotainment system can cause a safety problem, particularly when the reverse camera is not functioning, making it difficult for the driver to see behind the vehicle while reversing.
symptoms: The center screen is completely dead
no audio or video
no reverse view
unable to see anything while reversing.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the climate control system can cause discomfort and distraction to the driver, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The heating element functions independently
reaching high temperatures (approximately 151 degrees)
and cannot be manually operated; the switch that controls the roof also controls the heating elements.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the convertible top control system can cause unexpected and uncontrolled operation of the heating system, which can be a distraction to the driver and potentially lead to accidents.
symptoms: The switch that controls the convertible top also turns the heater on or off at random
even when the vehicle is parked and turned off
without warning.
